org.efaps.db.transaction

Class ConnectionResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.db.transaction.AbstractResource
      • org.efaps.db.transaction.ConnectionResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XAResource

    public class ConnectionResource
extends AbstractResource
    The class implements the XAResource interface for SQL connections.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit(Xid _xid, boolean _onePhase)
      Commits the global transaction specified by xid.
      void forget(Xid _xid)
      Tells the resource manager to forget about a heuristically completed transaction branch.
      protected void freeResource()
      Frees the resource and gives this connection resource back to the context object.
      Connection getConnection()
      This is the getter method for instance variable connection.
      int getTransactionTimeout()
      Obtains the current transaction timeout value set for this XAResource instance.
      int prepare(Xid _xid)
      Ask the resource manager to prepare for a transaction commit of the transaction specified in xid (used for 2-phase commits).
      Xid[] recover(int _flag)
      Obtains a list of prepared transaction branches from a resource manager.
      void rollback(Xid _xid)
      Informs the resource manager to roll back work done on behalf of a transaction branch.
      boolean setTransactionTimeout(int _seconds)
      Sets the current transaction timeout value for this XAResource instance.
